title: Were Pak Flags Raised During Dalit Protests? The Answer is No
subtitle: It couldn’t be verified when and where the photo doing the rounds was taken. But it did not show Pakistani flags.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A photograph has gone viral on social media with the claim that it is representative of a Dalit protest.

In the photo, bike-borne cadres can be seen raising a flag which, it is claimed, is the national flag of Pakistan.

The caption accompanying the photograph says ‘Dalit Andolan, Jhanda Pakistani, Yehi hai asli kahani’ (Dalit protest, Pakistani flag, this is the real story). The image with the caption has been shared widely on social media across various platforms.
